tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
quoteText: We encourage you to check this page periodically for updates to stay informed on how we collect, use and share your information. If we make material changes to this Privacy Policy, we will provide you with notice as required by law.
